Rubio cares about the country deeply. He has served the public for 16 years. It's his passion and he works very hard. You are entitled to your opinion, of course. But mine is that Rubio has the best chance of beating Hillary. His story is the essence of the American Dream and I find him to be uplifting and unifying with great ideas! #rubio2016

I really just want to know why Chris felt it necessary to comment on a post about two men getting married, just to basically tell them he does not approve (or Jesus or Satan or God doesn't approve, I dunno anymore). Why couldn't you have just seen this, said something to yourself, and moved on? What possessed you to make your initial post in the first place? Do you think after this couple reads it, they are going to quickly discover religion, get a divorce, and forever change their ways? What was your purpose for getting involved in the first place?

And the beat goes on. How about if we all call gun control """"gun safety"""". Pretending like the government is going to take away everyone's guns keeps people from using common sense. Most Americans favor gun safety--people should be made aware of how many are killed very week due to carelessness.
